description: Try this recipe for perfectly golden, crispy salmon potato cakes. Not to mention, the salmon-mash combo is a match made. Round off your meal with a green salad.
keywords: Potato cake,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Baking,Potato,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Crispy Salmon Potato Cakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook potato in a large saucepan of boiling water over medium-high heat for 15 minutes or until tender. Drain. Peel and discard loosened skin. Mash and refrigerate until cold.
Discard large bones and skin from salmon and flake into bowl with potato. Add onion, dill and 1 whisked egg. Season and mix to combine. Shape mixture into 8 patties.
Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Whisk remaining eggs in a shallow bowl. Lightly coat patties with flour, dip in egg and coat in breadcrumbs. Cover and chill for 15 minutes.
Place potato cakes and lemon wedges on a baking paper-lined tray. Spray both with oil. Bake for 20 minutes, turning halfway, or until golden brown.
Rinse peas under hot water to thaw. Drain well. Toss with lettuce. Serve potato cakes with salad and lemon wedges.
